post.title: I'm about to get banned. It's was nice shitposting with you all!

body: Questioning caps authority and pinging him multiple times while waiting for an explanation on the unjust exiles at +changelog. He literally ignored my questions, didn't tell me who I harassed, and what I did to harass said unspecified user. He just showed up and said stop with no context other than saying I've been harassing for ages, even though that's false it's been 3 days at most if pinging cap counts as harassment.
body_html: Questioning caps authority and pinging him multiple times while waiting for an explanation on the unjust exiles at +changelog. He literally ignored my questions, didn't tell me who I harassed, and what I did to harass said unspecified user. He just showed up and said stop with no context other than saying I've been harassing for ages, even though that's false it's been 3 days at most if pinging cap counts as harassment.

body:
This isn't Reddit, you're not gonna get banned for poking fun at people.

Milkit was a powermod who got banned for using alts to stalk and mass downvote people who had different opinions. You could say he was a Redditor.
